column1: Second Grade Sunnlv List
Welcome to second grade! Below is a list of the supplies needed. Please label all supplies with
your child's name unless otherwise noted.
column2: your child name unless otherwise noted

column1: 1 large CLOTH zipper style supply case filled with the following:
• 12 sharpened Ticonderoga pencils
• 1 standard pink pencil eraser
• 1 large ELMER'S glue stick
• 1 pair of Fiskar blunt tip scissors
• 1 yellow highlighter
• 1 box of 16 - 24 Crayola crayons
• 1 box of 8 Crayola washable markers
• 1 package of Expo fine -tip dry erase markers (preferably black)
column2: Expo fine tip dry erase markers

column1: • 4 composition notebooks (no spirals) 1 red. 1 blue. 1 black. 1 yellow
• 3 plastic folders (with nronws to hold papers and pockets on either side) 1 red. 1 blue,l
ftreen
• 1 small (3" x 3" for example) spiral bound memo notepad
• 1 old, oversized shirt to use as an art smock (please put in labeled gallon sized ziploc bag)
• 1 package of standard yellow post -it note pads to share
• 1 ELMIR'S white glue bottle
• 1 large box of tissues for classroom
• 1 container of Clorox wipes
• S7 in a labeled envelope for Scholastic News & Quickword Handbook
Donations of ziploc bags are greatly appreciated!
Please read over the summer and practice your addition and subtraction facts 1-20. This way you
will be ready for 2nd grade!
Thank you,
The Second Grade Teachers
